snippet: Wal-Mart’s deal to raise its stake in and become the controlling shareholder of Yihaodian, a Chinese e-commerce company, will move forward.
abstract: China's Ministry of Commerce announces that Wal-Mart Stores has received restricted approval to raise its stake in and become the controlling shareholder of Chinese e-commerce company, Yihaodian; China is expected to become the world's largest e-commerce market by 2015.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart’s deal to raise its stake in and become the controlling shareholder of Yihaodian, a Chinese e-commerce company, will move forward.

headline.seo: Wal-Mart Receives Restricted Approval for Deal in China
headline.main: China Allows Wider Role for Wal-Mart in Web Sales
headline.print_headline: China Allows Wider Role For Wal-Mart In Web Sales
